title: My Favorite Free Fonts
author: Steven Ng
__content:
# [Via Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/)

## Sans Serif

* [Cousine](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Cousine)
* [Hind](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Hind)
* [Inter](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Inter)
* [Karla](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Karla)
* [Lato](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lato)
* [Libre Franklin](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Libre+Franklin)
* [Mada](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Mada)
* [Merriweather Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Merriweather+Sans)
* [Montserrat](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Montserrat)
* [Noto Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Noto+Sans)
* [Nunito Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Nunito+Sans)
* [Open Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Open+Sans)


## Serif

* [Alegreya](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Alegreya)
* [Aleo](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Aleo)
* [Bitter](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bitter)
* [Fenix](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fenix)
* [Libre Baskerville](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Libre+Baskerville)
* [Crimson Text](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Crimson+Text)
* [EB Garamond](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/EB+Garamond)

## Display

* [Vast Shadow](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Vast+Shadow)
* [Barrio](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Barrio)

## Script

* [Lobster](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lobster)

## Monospace/Coding

* [Anonymous_Pro](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Anonymous+Pro)
* [Fira Code](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fira+Code)
* [Inconsolata](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Inconsolata)
* [Overpass Mono](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Overpass+Mono)

# [Via Font Squirrel](https://www.fontsquirrel.com)

## Sans Serif

* [Aileron](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/aileron)
* [Clear Sans](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/clear-sans)
* [Gidole](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/gidole)
* [Manrope](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/manrope)

## Display

* [Langdon](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/langdon)
* [Mohave](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/mohave)
* [Nautilus Pompilius](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/nautilus-pompilius)

## Script

* [Kitten](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/kitten)

## Monospace/Coding

* [Bitstream Vera Sans Mono](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Bitstream-Vera-Sans-Mono)
* [Deja Vu Sans Mono](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/dejavu-sans-mono)
* [Droid Sans Mono](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/droid-sans-mono)
* [Envy Code R](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Envy-Code-R)
* [Office Code Pro](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/office-code-pro)


# Other Sources

## Sans Serif

* [IBM Plex](https://github.com/IBM/plex/releases/)
* [Public Sans](http://github.com%/uswds%/public-sans)
* [Space Grotesk](http://fonts.floriankarsten.com%/space-grotesk)

## Display

* [Katahdin Round 2016](http://www.behance.net%/gallery%/24519649%/Katahdin-Round-Free-Font)
* [Taurus Mono](https://www.dafont.com/taurus-mono.font)

## Script

* [Southpaw Revisited](https://www.tylerfinck.com/blog/southpaw-revisited/)

## Monospace/Coding

* [Microsoft Cascadia Code](https://github.com/microsoft/cascadia-code)
* [ETC Trispace](https://www.etc.supply/trispace/)
* [Hack](https://sourcefoundry.org/hack/)
* [Input Family](https://input.fontbureau.com/)
* [JetBrains Mono](https://www.jetbrains.com/lp/mono/)
* [League Mono](https://tylerfinck.com/leaguemonovariable/)
* [Monofur](https://www.dafont.com/monofur.font)
* [Sometype Mono](https://monospacedfont.com/)

## Specialty

* [Sparks](https://github.com/aftertheflood/sparks) - Font for creating sparklines
